name: Captain Bewil (V)
Lore: 'Tactical officer from Dentaal. Leader. Familiar with utilizing computer controls to lure an invading enemy into a tactically weak position.',
Text: 'Agenda: logistics. While at Conference Room, opponent must lose 3 Force to ''react'' away from a battle, and, if your total Influence here is > 3, during your turn you may take an Interrupt into hand from Force Pile; reshuffle.',
